Translations.Text: niyata vasayenma api eya balagatu ratriyehi pahala kalemu
balagatu ratriya kumakdæ yi numba va dænuvat kale kumakda
balagatu ratriya masa dahasakata vada utumya
malakvarun ha maha atmaya (jibril) tama paramadhipatige anumætiyen sæma karunakma gena ehi pahala vanneya
santiyayi ! eya arunodaya uda vana kalaya tek pavatiyi
veda grantha satu janaya ha adesa tabannan aturin vu pratiksepa kala aya taman veta pæhædili sadhakaya pæminena tek (pratiksepa kirimen) ivatvanno novuha
enam pivituru karana lada patrika kiyavana allahgen (ema pæhædili sadhakaya) vu deva dutaya ya
tavada veda granthaya pirinamanu læbu janaya ovunata pæhædili sadhakaya pæminimen pasu va misa ovuhu ven va nogiyaha
pivituru dahama allahta puda karamin ohu va næmadimatat salataya sthapita kirimatat zakat pirinæmimatat misa ovuhu ana karanu nolæbuvoya. tavada rju dahama vanuye eyayi
sæbævinma pustaka lat janaya ha adesa tabannan aturin vu pratiksepa kalavun nira ginnehiya. ovuhu ehi sadatanikayo veti. ovunmaya mævim aturin ita ayahapatma mævima vanuye
sæbævinma visvasa kota dæhæmi kriyavan kalavun vana ovuhumaya mævim aturin srestha vanno
